text: Takayuki Kobayashi (小林 鷹之, Kobayashi Takayuki; born 29 November 1974) is a Japanese Liberal Democratic Party politician. He was the Minister for Economic Security from 2021 to 2022. In August 2024, Kobayashi announced his leadership candidacy for the Liberal Democratic Party in the 2024 leadership election. He lost the election to former Defense Minister Shigeru Ishiba on 27 September 2024. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Chiba Prefecture Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians
title: Takayuki Kobayashi
